meanings.sent1: The unlettered man struggled to read the simple instructions.
meanings.sent2: She felt embarrassed being unlettered in a room full of scholars.
meanings.sent3: The unlettered pirate mistook a treasure map for a drawing of a cat.
meanings.sent4: His unlettered mind was a blank canvas waiting to be filled with knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The unlettered child gazed in wonder at the alphabet for the first time.

meanings.definition: Not having knowledge or skill in a particular area.
meanings.sent1: The unlettered chef burned the toast every morning.
meanings.sent2: Feeling unlettered in technology, she asked for help setting up her email.
meanings.sent3: The unlettered gardener tried to grow carrots in a sandbox.
meanings.sent4: His unlettered attempts at painting resulted in colorful chaos on the canvas.
meanings.sent5: The unlettered musician struggled to play even a simple tune on the piano.

meanings.definition: Not marked or decorated with letters.
meanings.sent1: The unlettered sign confused drivers looking for the exit.
meanings.sent2: The unlettered tombstone stood bare in the old cemetery.
meanings.sent3: The unlettered notebook was perfect for sketching without lines getting in the way.
meanings.sent4: The unlettered banner fluttered in the wind, devoid of any message.
meanings.sent5: The unlettered wall was a blank canvas for graffiti artists to express themselves.
